text: The 1923–24 Mercer Bears men's basketball team represents Mercer University in the 1923–24 NCAA men's basketball season.https://mercerbears.com/documents/2018/11/29/2018_19_Men_s_Basketball_Media_Guide.pdf The team won the 1924 Southern Intercollegiate Athletic Association Men's Basketball Tournament over Centre. ==References== Category:Mercer Bears men's basketball seasons Mercer
title: 1923–24 Mercer Bears men's basketball team
